description: Exhausted flame, depleted energy. Let's restore your vitality.

art.title: Flame Renewal Art
art.instruction: Draw your inner flame as barely flickering, then show it slowly being rekindled with gentle care.
art.affirmation: I gently rekindle my inner flame with patience and self-care

art.title: Energy Restoration Visual
art.instruction: Create art showing your energy being slowly restored - like a battery charging or well being refilled.
art.affirmation: I restore my energy gradually and trust in my capacity for renewal

art.title: Burnout Recovery Timeline
art.instruction: Draw your burnout recovery journey - where you are, small steps forward, eventual renewal.
art.affirmation: I trust in my recovery journey and take it one gentle step at a time

breathwork.title: Restorative Breathing
breathwork.instruction: Very gentle, slow breathing focused on restoration rather than energizing. Breathe rest into depletion.
breathwork.affirmation: I breathe restoration into my depleted system and trust in renewal

breathwork.title: Energy Conservation Breath
breathwork.instruction: Breathe consciously to conserve and slowly rebuild energy rather than depleting further.
breathwork.affirmation: I breathe wisely to conserve energy and support my recovery

somatic.title: Complete Rest Permission
somatic.instruction: Practice complete rest without guilt. Your body needs this for healing.
somatic.affirmation: I give myself complete permission to rest and recover

somatic.title: Burnout Body Scan
somatic.instruction: Scan body for burnout's effects. Send gentle care to exhausted parts.
somatic.affirmation: I tend to my exhausted body with the care of a loving healer

cbt.title: Burnout Cause Analysis
cbt.instruction: Examine what led to burnout. What needs to change to prevent recurrence?
cbt.affirmation: I understand burnout's causes and make wise changes to prevent recurrence

cbt.title: Recovery Reality Planning
cbt.instruction: Plan realistic recovery steps. Burnout recovery takes time - honor that reality.
cbt.affirmation: I honor burnout recovery's timeline and take realistic steps toward healing

rebt.title: Superhuman Demand Challenge
rebt.instruction: Challenge beliefs about needing to do everything perfectly without rest.
rebt.affirmation: I am human, not superhuman, and deserve rest and realistic expectations

rebt.title: Rest Permission Practice
rebt.instruction: Challenge guilt about resting. Rest is necessary for humans, not laziness.
rebt.affirmation: I deserve rest and recovery without guilt or shame

neural.title: Energy Restoration Programming
neural.instruction: Install practices and beliefs that support energy restoration and burnout prevention.
neural.affirmation: I naturally care for my energy and prevent burnout through wise choices

neural.title: Sustainable Pace Installation
neural.instruction: Install identity of someone who works at sustainable pace and prioritizes wellbeing.
neural.affirmation: I naturally work at a sustainable pace that honors my wellbeing

journaling.title: Burnout Lessons Journal
journaling.instruction: Write about what burnout is teaching you about balance, boundaries, and self-care.
journaling.affirmation: I learn from burnout and integrate its lessons into wiser living

journaling.title: Energy Boundary Journal
journaling.instruction: Write about energy boundaries you need to establish to protect against future burnout.
journaling.affirmation: I establish healthy energy boundaries and protect my vitality

eft.title: Burnout Recovery Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though I'm burned out and exhausted, I choose to restore my energy gently and completely.'
eft.affirmation: I choose gentle, complete recovery from burnout

eft.title: Rest Permission Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though I feel guilty about resting, I deserve recovery and renewal without shame.'
eft.affirmation: I deserve rest and renewal without any guilt or shame

emdr.title: Energy Resource Installation
emdr.instruction: Install memories of feeling energized and vital through bilateral stimulation.
emdr.affirmation: I carry the blueprint for energy and vitality within me

emdr.title: Burnout Recovery Processing
emdr.instruction: Process the experience of burnout to extract wisdom while releasing trauma.
emdr.affirmation: I process burnout's experience and emerge wiser about sustainable living

yoga.title: Complete Restoration Sequence
yoga.instruction: Entirely restorative poses with full prop support. No effort, only receiving.
yoga.affirmation: I receive complete restoration and trust in my body's ability to renew

yoga.title: Gentle Energy Building
yoga.instruction: Very gentle movements that build energy slowly without depleting further.
yoga.affirmation: I build energy slowly and sustainably, honoring my recovery process
